vote.title: Authorize (1) a ten-year beverage services contract with PepsiCo Sales Inc. to provide full-service vending, case sales, and fountain pouring rights at Park and Recreation Facilities; (2) establish appropriations in the amount of $940,038.86; (3) the receipt and deposit revenue generated from this contract in the Imp. Maint. Rep. Programs/Sponsorships; (4) the disbursement of commission to The Superlative Group pursuant to Consultant Contract No. PKR-2021-000017177; and (5) authorize the transfer of 10 percent remaining after commission payment to the Park Endowment Fund - Estimated amount of $869,535.14 - Financing: Imp. Maint. Rep. Programs/Sponsorships Fund ($869,535.95) and Park Endowment Fund ($70,502.91); Estimated Revenue: Imp. Maint. Rep. Programs/Sponsorships $940,038.86 (This item was deferred on August 13, 2025)
